item.title: Prep Your Hugo Blog for R-bloggers
item.description: Get Ready for R-Bloggers There are lots of reasons to write a technical blog. Getting practice writing, thinking through ideas, etc. are all fulfilling reasons on their own. But life is always better with an audience. Well, not always. But for a blog it is. R-bloggers is a great platform to find an audience and share your writing with the world. If you’re writing with Hugo via blogdown though, there’s a hurdle you’ll need to clear.
